# looker_user_roles (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "looker_user_roles" "user_roles" {
  user_id    = looker_user.user.id
  role_names = ["Admin"]
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- **role_names** (Set of String)
- **user_id** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
